entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:15 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 8:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries and snow squalls beginning early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
